Text: Oñ abo Israe̩l kwogugu Shitim; tak amone̩ le̩ chane̩ eche̩ño̩ya bʼabigbe̩le̩ Moab.
Ama le̩ fʼamone̩-i do̩ wʼoko iche̩bo̩ amo̩jo̩-ma, oñ amone̩-i kwoje̩, ma laño̩ te̩kpe̩ ñw amo̩jo̩-ma.
Abe̩le̩ Israe̩l dʼo̩la-wñ dama kpai Beal-peo̩r. Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼIsrae̩l ma;
oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Mʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amone̩-i chaka ko, kʼe̩ ko ma lo̩ko̩li jo̩ ñwu Jihofa eju olu-i, todu kʼuwe̩do̩ Jihofa ki chʼuna una-i ki rida bʼabo Israe̩l te̩.
Taku Mose̩s ka ñw amakajo̩ Israe̩l kakini, E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ kʼi fʼaboke̩le̩-wñ ku ma kʼo̩la-ma dama kpai Beal-peo̩r le̩ kpa.
E̩ la go, e̩ne̩ Israe̩lʼka lewa, oñ i mʼonobule̩ Midianʼka du wʼugbo amo̩maye-wñ eju Mose̩s, kpai eju abo o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka, abu ku ma jʼaraku alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩.
Tak e̩gba ku Finehas, o̩ma E̩leaza, kʼi chʼo̩ma Aro̩n atama, fʼu li, i kwane̩ bʼef abo o̩gbadu le̩ te̩, oñ i la mʼo̩kwo̩ du nʼo̩wo̩,
i tʼe̩ne̩ Israe̩l le̩ ubi tef unyi ejefu, oñ i dʼo̩kwo̩ ro gu ama meji du, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ Israe̩l le̩ kpai efu onobule̩ le̩ oñ i rʼo̩ legudu. Abe̩le̩ ma fʼatulubo̩ dahi bʼabo Israe̩l te̩.
Abo kʼatulubo̩ le̩ kpa muda chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu nyoke me̩le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Finehas, o̩ma E̩leaza, kʼi chʼo̩ma Aro̩n atama le̩, owñ mʼuwe̩do̩-mi rida bʼabo Israe̩l te̩ me̩, owñ chʼabu kʼi nʼogu e-mi aja efu-ma le̩, todu e-le̩ oñ omi ma fʼabo Israe̩l lie̩ ef ogu-mi kʼu ja n.
Todule̩ uwe̩ kika kakini, Go, u mʼalo ure̩do̩-mi du ñw u me̩;
oñ i ado̩mo̩ ñw owñ kpai amugbe̩-wñ ubi owñ, owñ chʼalo uko̩lo̩ atama eche o̩gbegbele̩, todabu kʼi jogu tod O̩jo̩-wñ, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod abo Israe̩l.
Odu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Israe̩l ku ma kpa le̩, e-ku ma kpa manyʼonobule̩ Midian le̩, la ko̩ Zimri, o̩ma Salu, kʼi chʼidachi abo unyi e̩ne̩fe̩nyi abo Simeo̩nʼka.
Oñ odu onobule̩ Midian ku ma kpa le̩ ko̩ Kozbi, o̩ma Zur; ata-wñ la chʼoji abo unyi e̩ne̩fe̩nyiʼka Midian.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Chʼabo Midian le̩ ihianyi, kʼe̩ gwo̩ ma da;
todu ama nʼo̩gwo̩-ma che me̩ ihianyi, owñ chʼo̩gwo̩ ku ma gwo̩ me̩ ef o̩la Peo̩r le̩, kpai ef o̩la Kozbi, o̩ma idachi Midian, o̩maye-ma onobule̩ le̩, e-ku ma du kpa o̩jo̩ atulubo̩ le̩ tod o̩la Peo̩r.
